messages.subject: On the ground in Nihon
messages.msgSnippet: Sounds like a bunch of us are going to be in Japan at the same time this summer (I m landing 6/27), so I think everyone who is going to be there should join me
messages.messageBody:
Sounds like a bunch of us are going to be in Japan at the same time this summer
(I'm landing 6/27), so I think everyone who is going to be there should join me
for a conversation over to the other group and we should coordinate something -
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/japantoday/
